testcase.name: should login as a new user
should create new article and validate article appears in feed
should edit an article and validate changed article text
should update headline and verify change
should add the follower user and verify following count increases by one
should remove the follower user and verify following count decreases by one
should search for special article and verify author
should update user email and verify
should update user zipcode and verify
should update user password and verify
